title: Microsoft Teams: Teams chat support in Mesh events
description: We will not release the Teams chat in Mesh events feature at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available in Teams. Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.
